title: League Vs Windows???
body: So my league was working fine earlier, then I got off for 2 hours. Then when I tried to get back on it says "League is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again." So I uninstalled and re-installed and the same thing came up again. Idk what to do, but I wanna get back on league.

replies.body:
Hmmm some of those game files might have gotten corrupted somehow. Refer to the image I'll post below for a certain file to delete and another to open, and let me know how that works!

https://i.gyazo.com/ae73d3690243c710652a6ea1bf295a7a.png

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XA5feRnf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-03T21:56:18.110+0000)
>
> Hmmm some of those game files might have gotten corrupted somehow. Refer to the image I'll post below for a certain file to delete and another to open, and let me know how that works!
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/ae73d3690243c710652a6ea1bf295a7a.png

It worked. Thank you very much

Bump for same issue.

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libssl-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020.
